::Prowl::

His eyes serious, Prowl steps forward as he listens to Iris' 
re=
sponce, more questions running through his mind.

Was he? Was he willing to=
 give half his spark for the femmbot he 
loved? He had never loved anyone a=
s much as he loved Iron Raptor, 
this was all new to him. But the answer wa=
s clear. Yes, he would give 
half his spark, he'd even give more, anything =
for her.

Prowl nods, resolution in his eyes. "Yes," he says simply, "What =
do I 
have to do?"
